mapper.sql: id, create_time, miner_order_id, member_id, reward_amount, money, `type`, unlock_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bt_bank_miner_order_transaction ( id, create_time, miner_order_id, member_id, reward_amount, money, type, unlock_time ) VALUES ( #{tr.id}, NOW(), #{tr.minerOrderId}, #{tr.memberId}, #{tr.rewardAmount}, #{tr.money}, #{tr.type}, DATE_ADD(DATE(NOW()),INTERVAL #{timeSpan} MINUTE))
mapper.select: SELECT id, member_id memberId, balance amount, create_time createTime, 1 as type FROM bt_bank_miner_balance_transaction WHERE type = 1 and balance > 0 AND create_time <= #{time}
SELECT id, member_id memberId, reward_amount amount, create_time createTime, 0 as type FROM bt_bank_miner_order_transaction WHERE type IN (1, 2) AND unlock_time <= NOW()
